title: Person Statement
description: The statement contains information known about a natural person at a particular point in time, or from a given submission of information.
technical note: The parent object should be validated using the Person Statement schema.

title: Entity Statement
description: The statement contains information that identifies and describes an entity at a particular point in time, or from a given submission of information.
technical note: The parent object should be validated using the Entity Statement schema.

title: Ownership-or-control Statement
description: The statement contains details of the interests held by an interested party in an entity at a particular point in time.
technical note: The parent object should be validated using the Ownership-or-control Statement schema.
